Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
com.group18.dao.UserDAO
public class UserDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for interacting with the "users" table in the database. Provides methods for CRUD operations and user-related queries.

  • Method Details

    • authenticateUser

      public User authenticateUser(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to authenticate.
      password - The password of the user to authenticate.
      Returns:
      The authenticated User object, or null if authentication fails.

    • findById

      public User findById(int userId)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The User object corresponding to the given ID, or null if not found.

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users from the "users" table.
      Returns:
      A list of all users in the database.

    • addUser

      public boolean addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the "users" table.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object to be added.
      Returns:
      True if the user was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(User user)
      Updates the details of an existing user in the "users" table.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object with updated information.
      Returns:
      True if the user was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(int userId)
      Deletes a user from the "users" table.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the user was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • getNewUsersThisMonth

      public long getNewUsersThisMonth()
      Retrieves the count of new users created in the current month.
      Returns:
      The number of new users created in the current month.

    • extractUserFromResultSet

      private User extractUserFromResultSet(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Extracts a User object from the current row of a ResultSet.
      Parameters:
      rs - The ResultSet object containing the user data.
      Returns:
      A User object populated with the data from the ResultSet.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the ResultSet.
